thread.title: Grammys 2017 Red Carpet: CeeLo Green Goes Gold, Lil Yachty's Skittles Grill & More
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017 Red Carpet: CeeLo Green Goes Gold, Lil Yachty's Skittles Grill & More

author: Trent Clark
title: Grammys 2017 Red Carpet: CeeLo Green Goes Gold, Lil Yachty's Skittles Grill & More
text:
0 
Los Angeles, CA – The biggest night in music is the perfect time for artists to make a statement and gain insta-fame. And that’s before one note is performed. 
The 59th Grammy Awards red carpet did not disappoint when it came to artists entertaining us with their fashion sense (or lack of) and Hip Hop was definitely in the building this year. Chance The Rapper was all smiles ahead of his anticipated big night.
